sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
	A.order_id
	,A.item_id
	,A.product_id
	,A.quantity
	,A.list_price
	,A.discount
FROM 
	BikeStores.sales.order_items AS A
	INNER JOIN BikeStores.sales.orders AS B 
		ON A.order_id = B.order_id
WHERE 
	B.order_date >= CAST(CAST('@{item().FechaProceso}' AS DATE) AS DATETIME) 
	AND B.order_date < CAST(DATEADD(DAY, 1, CAST('@{item().FechaProceso}' AS DATE)) AS DATETIME)
;

SELECT 
	order_id
	,customer_id
	,order_status
	,order_date
	,required_date
	,shipped_date
	,store_id
	,staff_id
FROM 
	BikeStores.sales.orders
WHERE 
	order_date >= CAST(CAST('@{item().FechaProceso}' AS DATE) AS DATETIME) 
	AND order_date < CAST(DATEADD(DAY, 1, CAST('@{item().FechaProceso}' AS DATE)) AS DATETIME)
;

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
	Codigo, 
	Clave, 
	CAST(CASE 
		WHEN Valor IS NULL THEN CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)
		WHEN LEN(RTRIM(LTRIM(Valor))) = 0 THEN CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)
		ELSE DATEADD(DAY, 1, CAST(Valor AS DATE))
	END AS VARCHAR(15)) AS Valor 
FROM 
	dbo.Parametros 
WHERE 
	Clave = 'FechaProceso';
